Name: T3 - Take the Turn
About the game: Take the Turn is a turn based multiplayer racing game for up to four players. *** Features *** - Play with people from all around the world or connect directly with your friends in private matches. - Customize the look and stats of your racing car. - Create your own tracks using the ingame editor and race other people on your own creations. - Practice mode to improve your skills while offline. - Crossplay between Mobile and PC
